name: Bullet Show 2: Provoli Revenge
description:
Our protagonist T4, is rebooted for an equipment test. Provoli is conducting a program in the abandoned facility of CERCH (aka blackmesa), a former weapons and robotics factory. T4 must follow the Provoli show to get to the end of the installation and find out why it has been abandoned for so long.

T4 starts with a weapon, which was given by Provoli. He is also equiped with a dash that allows him to dodge damage. Try to survive and improve your robotic pieces to be able to overcome the Machiavellian plans of the great Provoli.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Crontols Action A,S,D,W Move RRestart levelmouse right Dash mouse leftShoot

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The only non-personal asset I have used is the music:

https://deepglowing.itch.io - DeepGlowing (Graphic designer).

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Note: the game is currently in development. Still lacks a lot of content, and it will be ready in 2 weeks.
